planet.name: Kepler-160 b
KIC 7269974 b
Gaia DR2 2102587087846067712 b
KOI-456 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Rowe et al. 2014. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Heller et al. 2020 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
